title: AutoTaskClaimer Agent
description: Create an AutoTaskClaimer Agent to automatically scan and claim PENDING tasks in master task files using atomic file operations and locks.
benefits: Ensures no unclaimed tasks linger and speeds up task assignment
Reduces manual intervention for task claiming
Fully autonomous task assignment based on agent workload
tasks: Finalize and integrate AutoTaskClaimer script into supervisor tools
Configure polling intervals and agent_id parameterization
Write integration tests for multi-file sharding scenarios
Monitor and log claim events for auditability
